Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Reroute at King Drive/63rd
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 63rd, Prairie, 61st and King Drive: due to, street blockage near King Drive/63rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via King Drive, 63rd, Prairie, 61st, King Drive and over regular route, due to street blockage near King Drive/63rd.

Allow extra travel time.
